title.narrative: LEADING FROM THE SOUTH- Grantmaking (Project and Capacity Building) 2020

description.narrative: Project grants awarded to seven (7) Women's Rights Organisations within Africa from July to September 2020 under the LFS initiative year four
Provide funds to selected Women's Rights Organisations in Africa and the Middle East under the LFS initiative- year four (4)
Women's Rights Organisations (Small grassroots, Intermediate, Large, and consortium/Networks) within Africa and the Middle East.

activity-date.narrative: The date indicated above signifies the start of activities under the LFS initiative- year four (4)
The date indicated above signifies the date scheduled for the completion of the four-year Phase 1 of the Leading from the South initiative.

recipient-region.narrative: Project grants awarded to seven (7) Women's Rights Organisations across Africa from July to September under the LFS initiative- year four.
There were no project grants awarded to Women's Rights Organisations in the Middle East from July to September under the LFS initiative year four (4).
There were no capacity-building grants awarded to Women's Rights Organisations across Africa from July to September under the LFS initiative -year four (4)
There were no capacity-building grants awarded to Women's Rights Organisations in the Middle East from July to September under the LFS initiative -year four (4).

description.narrative:
Project grants disbursed to seven (7) Women's Rights Organisations within the Middle East from January to March 2020, under the LFS initiative year four (4).
There were no project grants disbursed to Women's Rights Organisations in the Middle East in the 2nd quarter of 2020 (April to June) due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
There were no project grants disbursed to Women's Rights Organisations in the Middle East in the 3rd quarter of 2020 (July to September) due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
Project grants disbursed to seven (7) Women's Rights Organisations across Africa in the 3rd quarter of 2020 (from July to September) under the LFS initiative year four.

Capacity-building grants disbursed to seven (7) women's rights organisations in the Middle East from January to March 2020 under the LFS initiative year four (4).
There were no Capacity Building grants disbursed in the 2nd quarter of 2020 (April-June) due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
There were no Capacity Building grants disbursed in the 3rd quarter of 2020 (July-September) due to the Covid-19 pandemic.

Capacity-building grant disbursed to thirty-four (34) Women's Rights Organisations across Africa from January to March 2020, under the LFS initiative year four (4).
There were no Capacity Building grants disbursed in the 2nd quarter of 2020 (April-June) due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
There were no Capacity Building grants disbursed in the 3rd quarter of 2020 (July-September) due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
